page.title: 05A walk in the winter
page.content: In January 1985 Mrs Trotman,a local amateur naturalist,took Alex, Imogen, Lynn,Scott and me, and me,Tamsin, for a walk in the snow.First we saw rabbit's footprints.They went two together and then one right across the field.We climbed over a gate and saw a dead shrew.It had blood on its nose.With it were the footprints of a fox.The fox may have jumped ont the shrew but did not like the taste and put it down. We used the binoculars to look at a hare about two fields away.Suddenly Alex saw a hare in the same field as us.We followed the footprints.Hares run very fast.Suddenly we heard a noise.It was a curlew.We looked through the binoculars at the curlew in the next field.After the walk we went to Mrs Trotman's house for a drink of hot orange.We watched thebirds in her garden.There were robins,blackbirds,and bluetits.
